comment:
* Content capture options for a given package. * *

This object is created by the Content Capture System Service and passed back to the app when * the application is created. * * @hide

variables.name: maxBufferSize
variables.comment: * Maximum number of events that are buffered before sent to the app.

variables.name: idleFlushingFrequencyMs
variables.comment: * Frequency the buffer is flushed if idle.

variables.name: textChangeFlushingFrequencyMs
variables.comment: * Frequency the buffer is flushed if last event is a text change.

variables.name: logHistorySize
variables.comment: * Size of events that are logging on {@code dump}.

variables.name: disableFlushForViewTreeAppearing
variables.comment:
* Disable flush when receiving a VIEW_TREE_APPEARING event.
     * @hide

variables.name: enableReceiver
variables.comment:
* Is the content capture receiver enabled.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: contentProtectionOptions
variables.comment:
* Options for the content protection flow.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: whitelistedComponents
variables.comment:
* List of activities explicitly allowlisted for content capture (or {@code null} if allowlisted
     * for all acitivites in the package).

variables.name: lite
variables.comment:
* Used to enable just a small set of APIs so it can used by activities belonging to the
     * content capture service APK.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel parcel, int flags)
